title: After updating to Android 11, it incorrectly says I'm over my data limit and "view plan" crashes
content: After getting the update to Android 11, my pixel 3 is now incorrectly complaining that I'm over my data limit (notification is "High mobile data usage".  When I tap on it, it thinks my plan is only ~541MB (it's much higher). When I tap "view plan" to try to correct it, the screen flashes then comes back to the same screen (as if the "view plan" screen crashed).  Rebooting did not help.
